Keywords: Avengers , Scientist , Spy
Real Name: Janet Van Dyne
Special Powers
RECRUITER: POWER: Choose a character with the Avengers keyword in your KO area that hasn't been chosen for or generated by a Recruiter effect. If you do, generate a character with the Avengers keyword from your Sideline that has a lower point value than the chosen character. This game, the generated character can't be replaced and your opponent scores them immediately instead of when they're KO'd.
PYM PARTICLES: FREE: Choose one: [Tiny symbol], [Standard damage symbol] or [Giant symbol]. Wasp has the chosen symbol until you choose again. Protected: Pulse Wave.

@Dioneo line of fire: if you're small opposing figs can shoot over you and if you're giant opposing figs can shoot over your friends. Also to carry standard figures without people having line of fire to you.
February 2, 2022
Dioneo
I don't know why you'd ever choose standard size, but being able to switch between tiny size for the extra point of defence from ranged attacks or giant size for the easy willpower roll and improved targeting is pretty great.
